sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react';
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';
import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col';
import { ExperienceStateContext, ExperienceDispatchContext } from 'context/experience'


const Experience = ({title, roleTitle, employer, startDate, endDate, description, index}) => {
    const state = useContext(ExperienceStateContext)
    const dipatch = useContext(ExperienceDispatchContext)
    const onChange = (event) => {
        dipatch({
            type: 'update',
            index: 'index',
            fieldName: event.target.id,
            payload: event.currentTarget.value,
        })
    }
    return (
        <React.Fragment>
            <Form.Row>
                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="workTitle">
                    <Form.Label>Titel</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control type="text" onChange={onChange} defaultValue={roleTitle}/>
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="employer">
                    <Form.Label>Arbetsgivare</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onChange}  defaultValue={employer}/>
                </Form.Group>
            </Form.Row>

            <Form.Row>
                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="startDate">
                    <Form.Label>Start</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onChange} type="date" defaultValue={startDate}/>
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="endDate">
                    <Form.Label>Slut</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onChange} type="date" defaultValue={endDate}/>
                </Form.Group>
            </Form.Row>

            <Form.Group controlId="description">
                <Form.Label>Beskrivning</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control onChange={onChange} as="textarea" rows="4" defaultValue={description}/>
            </Form.Group>
        </React.Fragment>
    )
}



export default Experience
